txt_en: The secret of discipline is motivation. When a man is sufficiently motivated, discipline will take care of itself.
txt_cn: 自律的关键是动机，当一个人的动力足够时，他自然就能自律。
author: Sir Alexander Paterson

txt_en: We don't want to tell our dreams. We want to show them.
txt_cn: 我们不想把梦想说出来，而是想展现出来。
author: Cristiano Ronaldo

txt_en: Life isn't tied with a bow, but it's still a gift.
txt_cn: 生活没有打上蝴蝶结，但它仍是一份礼物。
author: Regina Brett

txt_en: True self-discovery begins where your comfort zone ends.
txt_cn: 真正的自我发现，始于你踏出了你的舒适区。
author: Adam Braun

txt_en: Don't settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.
txt_cn: 不要满足于生活赋予你的，要有所创造，让人生变得更好。
author: Ashton Kutcher

txt_en: I am not afraid of tomorrow for I have seen yesterday and I love today.
txt_cn: 我不害怕明天，因为我经历过昨天，又热爱今天。
author: William Allen White

txt_en: So often people are working hard at the wrong thing. Working on the right thing is probably more important than working hard.
txt_cn: 很多时候人们努力错了方向，在对的事情上努力可能比努力本身还重要。
author: Caterina Fake

txt_en: If everything was perfect, you would never learn and you would never grow.
txt_cn: 如果一切皆完美，你就永远不会学到东西，永远不会成长。
author: Beyonce Knowles

txt_en: Be careful how you judge people, most of all friends. You don't sum up a man's life in one moment.
txt_cn: 小心你是怎么评判他人的，尤其是朋友。你不能在片刻间总结一个人的一生。
author: Al Pacino

txt_en: Just trust yourself, then you will know how to live.
txt_cn: 相信自己就对了，你将知道如何过日子。
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

txt_en: You don't love someone because they're perfect. You love them in spite of the fact that they're not.
txt_cn: 不是因为一个人完美你才爱，而是即使那人不完美你也会去爱。
author: Jodi Picoult

txt_en: That was my way of getting through difficult times of low confidence — hard work.
txt_cn: 克服自信低潮的艰难时期，我只用一个方法：努力。
author: David Beckham

txt_en: ㅤ
txt_cn: ㅤ
author: ㅤ

txt_en: Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others.
txt_cn: 与他人分享快乐，我们会收获加倍的快乐。
author: A. Nielsen

txt_en: Dreams are like stars. You may never touch them, but if you follow them, they will lead you to your destiny.
txt_cn: 梦想就像星星。也许你永远无法触碰，但如果你跟随它们，它们将引领你找到人生的路。
author: Liam Payne

txt_en: You make a life out of what you have, not what you're missing.
txt_cn: 你是靠自己所拥有的，而不是所缺少的来过你的人生。
author: Kate Morton

txt_en: Nothing is so strong as gentleness, nothing so gentle as real strength.
txt_cn: 没有什么比温柔更有力量，也没有什么比真正的力量更温柔。
author: Saint Francis de Sales

txt_en: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
txt_cn: 爱情不识藩篱。它将跨栏杆、越栅栏、穿围墙，满怀憧憬地抵达终点。
author: Maya Angelou

txt_en: You do not write your life with words. You write it with actions.
txt_cn: 你不是用文字来书写你的人生的，而是用行动。
author: Patrick Ness

txt_en: It is our privilege and our adventure to discover our own special light.
txt_cn: 去发现属于自己的独特光芒吧。这是我们的特权，也是我们的冒险。
author: Mary Dunbar

txt_en: Regardless of who you are or what you have been, you can be what you want to be.
txt_cn: 无论你的现在和过去如何，你都可以决定你的将来。
author: W. Clement Stone

txt_en: The bravest sight in the world is to see a great man struggling against adversity.
txt_cn: 世界上最勇敢的景象，便是勇者无畏地与逆境搏斗。
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

txt_en: A multitude of small delights constitute happiness.
txt_cn: 幸福就是许多小确幸的总和。
author: Charles Baudelaire

txt_en: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope.
txt_cn: 黑夜永远无法阻止日出，困难也绝不会战胜希望。
author: Bernard Williams

txt_en: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
txt_cn: 当你终于因为现实比梦境更美而无法入睡时，你便是陷入了爱情。
author: Dr. Seuss

txt_en: We cannot change anything until we accept it.
txt_cn: 我们无法改变任何事，直到我们接受它的存在。
author: Carl Jung

txt_en: One can never consent to creep when one feels an impulse to soar.
txt_cn: 一个人内心有了飞翔的冲动，就不会满足于在地上匍匐。
author: Helen Keller

txt_en: Enjoy your youth. You'll never be younger than you are at this very moment.
txt_cn: 享受年轻时光吧！下一刻的你再不会有此刻的青春。
author: Chad Sugg

txt_en: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
txt_cn: 对于下定决心的人来说，任何机遇、命数或运气都无法阻挠、控制其意志。
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

txt_en: The way to get things done is not to mind who gets the credit for doing them.
txt_cn: 把事情做好的方法，是不去在意谁会因此得到赞誉。
author: Benjamin Jowett

txt_en: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights.
txt_cn: 真爱都是悄然降临，既不旗幡招展，也不灯火辉煌。
author: Erich Segal
